verses.verse: ה֣וֹי <S%H1945><s%> Woe שׁוֹדֵ֗ד <S%H7703><s%> to thee that spoilest וְאַתָּה֙ <S%H859><s%> you לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> were not שָׁד֔וּד <S%H7703><s%> and thou [wast] not spoiled וּבוֹגֵ֖ד <S%H898><s%> and dealest treacherously וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> while did not בָ֣גְדוּ <S%H898><s%> and they dealt not treacherously ב֑וֹ כַּהֲתִֽמְךָ֤ <S%H8552><s%> with thee when thou shalt cease שׁוֹדֵד֙ <S%H7703><s%> to spoil תּוּשַּׁ֔ד <S%H7703><s%> thou shalt be spoiled כַּנְּלֹתְךָ֥ <S%H5239><s%> [and] when thou shalt make an end לִבְגֹּ֖ד <S%H898><s%> to deal treacherously יִבְגְּדוּ־ <S%H898><s%> they shall deal treacherously בָֽךְ׃ ס

יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD חָנֵּ֖נוּ <S%H2603><s%> be gracious לְךָ֣ קִוִּ֑ינוּ <S%H6960><s%> unto us we have waited הֱיֵ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> become זְרֹעָם֙ <S%H2220><s%> for thee be thou their arm לַבְּקָרִ֔ים <S%H1242><s%> every morning אַף־ <S%H637><s%> also יְשׁוּעָתֵ֖נוּ <S%H3444><s%> our salvation בְּעֵ֥ת <S%H6256><s%> also in the time צָרָֽה׃ <S%H6869><s%> of trouble

מִקּ֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> At the noise הָמ֔וֹן <S%H1995><s%> of the tumult נָדְד֖וּ <S%H5074><s%> fled עַמִּ֑ים <S%H5971><s%> the people מֵר֣וֹמְמֻתֶ֔ךָ <S%H7427><s%> at the lifting up נָפְצ֖וּ <S%H5310><s%> were scattered גּוֹיִֽם׃ <S%H1471><s%> of thyself the nations

וְאֻסַּ֣ף <S%H622><s%> shall be gathered שְׁלַלְכֶ֔ם <S%H7998><s%> And your spoil אֹ֖סֶף <S%H625><s%> [like] the gathering הֶֽחָסִ֑יל <S%H2625><s%> of the caterpiller כְּמַשַּׁ֥ק <S%H4944><s%> as the running to and fro גֵּבִ֖ים <S%H1357><s%> of locusts שׁוֹקֵ֥ק <S%H8264><s%> shall he run בּֽוֹ׃

נִשְׂגָּ֣ב <S%H7682><s%> is exalted יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for שֹׁכֵ֖ן <S%H7931><s%> for he dwelleth מָר֑וֹם <S%H4791><s%> on high מִלֵּ֣א <S%H4390><s%> he hath filled צִיּ֔וֹן <S%H6726><s%> Zion מִשְׁפָּ֖ט <S%H4941><s%> with judgment וּצְדָקָֽה׃ <S%H6666><s%> and righteousness

וְהָיָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> become אֱמוּנַ֣ת <S%H530><s%> shall be the stability עִתֶּ֔יךָ <S%H6256><s%> of thy times חֹ֥סֶן <S%H2633><s%> [and] strength יְשׁוּעֹ֖ת <S%H3444><s%> of salvation חָכְמַ֣ת <S%H2451><s%> And wisdom וָדָ֑עַת <S%H1847><s%> and knowledge יִרְאַ֥ת <S%H3374><s%> the fear יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD הִ֥יא <S%H1931><s%> he אוֹצָרֽוֹ׃ <S%H214><s%> [is] his treasure ס

הֵ֚ן <S%H2005><s%> Behold אֶרְאֶלָּ֔ם <S%H691><s%> Behold their valiant ones צָעֲק֖וּ <S%H6817><s%> shall cry חֻ֑צָה <S%H2351><s%> without מַלְאֲכֵ֣י <S%H4397><s%> the ambassadors שָׁל֔וֹם <S%H7965><s%> of peace מַ֖ר <S%H4751><s%> bitterly יִבְכָּיֽוּן׃ <S%H1058><s%> shall weep

נָשַׁ֣מּוּ <S%H8074><s%> lie waste מְסִלּ֔וֹת <S%H4546><s%> The highways שָׁבַ֖ת <S%H7673><s%> ceaseth עֹבֵ֣ר <S%H5674><s%> the traveler אֹ֑רַח <S%H734><s%> manner הֵפֵ֤ר <S%H6565><s%> he hath broken בְּרִית֙ <S%H1285><s%> the covenant מָאַ֣ס <S%H3988><s%> he hath despised עָרִ֔ים <S%H5892><s%> the cities לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> has no חָשַׁ֖ב <S%H2803><s%> he regardeth אֱנֽוֹשׁ׃ <S%H376><s%> he

אָבַ֤ל <S%H56><s%> mourneth אֻמְלְלָה֙ <S%H535><s%> [and] languisheth אָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> The earth הֶחְפִּ֥יר <S%H2659><s%> is ashamed לְבָנ֖וֹן <S%H3844><s%> Lebanon קָמַ֑ל <S%H7060><s%> [and] hewn down הָיָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> become הַשָּׁרוֹן֙ <S%H8289><s%> Sharon כָּֽעֲרָבָ֔ה <S%H6160><s%> is like a wilderness וְנֹעֵ֥ר <S%H5287><s%> shake off בָּשָׁ֖ן <S%H1316><s%> and Bashan וְכַרְמֶֽל׃ <S%H3760><s%> and Carmel

עַתָּ֥ה <S%H6258><s%> Now אָק֖וּם <S%H6965><s%> Now will I rise יֹאמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> saith יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD עַתָּה֙ <S%H6258><s%> Now אֵֽרוֹמָ֔ם <S%H7311><s%> bring up עַתָּ֖ה <S%H6258><s%> now אֶנָּשֵֽׂא׃ <S%H5375><s%> now will I lift up

תַּהֲר֥וּ <S%H2029><s%> Ye shall conceive חֲשַׁ֖שׁ <S%H2842><s%> chaff תֵּ֣לְדוּ <S%H3205><s%> ye shall bring forth קַ֑שׁ <S%H7179><s%> stubble רוּחֲכֶ֕ם <S%H7307><s%> your breath אֵ֖שׁ <S%H784><s%> [as] fire תֹּאכַלְכֶֽם׃ <S%H398><s%> shall devour

וְהָי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> become עַמִּ֖ים <S%H5971><s%> And the people מִשְׂרְפ֣וֹת <S%H4955><s%> shall be [as] the burnings שִׂ֑יד <S%H7875><s%> of lime קוֹצִ֥ים <S%H6975><s%> [as] thorns כְּסוּחִ֖ים <S%H3683><s%> cut up בָּאֵ֥שׁ <S%H784><s%> in the fire יִצַּֽתּוּ׃ <S%H3341><s%> shall they be burned ס

שִׁמְע֥וּ <S%H8085><s%> Hear רְחוֹקִ֖ים <S%H7350><s%> ye [that are] far off אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> what עָשִׂ֑יתִי <S%H6213><s%> what I have done וּדְע֥וּ <S%H3045><s%> acknowledge קְרוֹבִ֖ים <S%H7138><s%> and ye [that are] near גְּבֻרָתִֽי׃ <S%H1369><s%> my might

פָּחֲד֤וּ <S%H6342><s%> are afraid בְצִיּוֹן֙ <S%H6726><s%> in Zion חַטָּאִ֔ים <S%H2400><s%> The sinners אָחֲזָ֥ה <S%H270><s%> hath surprised רְעָדָ֖ה <S%H7461><s%> fearfulness חֲנֵפִ֑ים <S%H2611><s%> the hypocrites מִ֣י ׀ <S%H4310><s%> Who יָג֣וּר <S%H1481><s%> Who among us shall dwell לָ֗נוּ אֵ֚שׁ <S%H784><s%> burning אוֹכֵלָ֔ה <S%H398><s%> with the devouring מִי־ <S%H4310><s%> Who יָג֥וּר <S%H1481><s%> live לָ֖נוּ מוֹקְדֵ֥י <S%H4168><s%> burning עוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> with everlasting

הֹלֵ֣ךְ <S%H1980><s%> He that walketh צְדָק֔וֹת <S%H6666><s%> righteously וְדֹבֵ֖ר <S%H1696><s%> and speaketh מֵֽישָׁרִ֑ים <S%H4339><s%> uprightly מֹאֵ֞ס <S%H3988><s%> he that despiseth בְּבֶ֣צַע <S%H1215><s%> the gain מַעֲשַׁקּ֗וֹת <S%H4642><s%> of oppressions נֹעֵ֤ר <S%H5287><s%> that shaketh כַּפָּיו֙ <S%H3709><s%> his hands מִתְּמֹ֣ךְ <S%H8551><s%> from holding בַּשֹּׁ֔חַד <S%H7810><s%> of bribes אֹטֵ֤ם <S%H331><s%> that stoppeth אָזְנוֹ֙ <S%H241><s%> his ears מִשְּׁמֹ֣עַ <S%H8085><s%> from hearing דָּמִ֔ים <S%H1818><s%> of blood וְעֹצֵ֥ם <S%H6105><s%> and shutteth עֵינָ֖יו <S%H5869><s%> his eyes מֵרְא֥וֹת <S%H7200><s%> from seeing בְּרָֽע׃ <S%H7451><s%> evil

ה֚וּא <S%H1931><s%> he מְרוֹמִ֣ים <S%H4791><s%> on high יִשְׁכֹּ֔ן <S%H7931><s%> He shall dwell מְצָד֥וֹת <S%H4679><s%> [shall be] the munitions סְלָעִ֖ים <S%H5553><s%> of rocks מִשְׂגַּבּ֑וֹ <S%H4869><s%> his place of defence לַחְמ֣וֹ <S%H3899><s%> bread נִתָּ֔ן <S%H5414><s%> shall be given מֵימָ֖יו <S%H4325><s%> him his waters נֶאֱמָנִֽים׃ <S%H539><s%> [shall be] sure

מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king בְּיָפְי֖וֹ <S%H3308><s%> in his beauty תֶּחֱזֶ֣ינָה <S%H2372><s%> shall see עֵינֶ֑יךָ <S%H5869><s%> Thine eyes תִּרְאֶ֖ינָה <S%H7200><s%> they shall behold אֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land מַרְחַקִּֽים׃ <S%H4801><s%> that is very far off

לִבְּךָ֖ <S%H3820><s%> Thine heart יֶהְגֶּ֣ה <S%H1897><s%> shall meditate אֵימָ֑ה <S%H367><s%> terror אַיֵּ֤ה <S%H346><s%> Where סֹפֵר֙ <S%H5608><s%> Where [is] the scribe אַיֵּ֣ה <S%H346><s%> Where שֹׁקֵ֔ל <S%H8254><s%> ? where [is] the receiver אַיֵּ֖ה <S%H346><s%> Where סֹפֵ֥ר <S%H5608><s%> ? where [is] he that counted אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמִּגְדָּלִֽים׃ <S%H4026><s%> castle

אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> people נוֹעָ֖ז <S%H3267><s%> a fierce לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> will no תִרְאֶ֑ה <S%H7200><s%> Thou shalt not see עַ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> a people עִמְקֵ֤י <S%H6012><s%> of a deeper שָׂפָה֙ <S%H8193><s%> speech מִשְּׁמ֔וֹעַ <S%H8085><s%> than thou canst perceive נִלְעַ֥ג <S%H3932><s%> of a stammering לָשׁ֖וֹן <S%H3956><s%> tongue אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> no בִּינָֽה׃ <S%H998><s%> [that thou canst] not understand

חֲזֵ֣ה <S%H2372><s%> Look צִיּ֔וֹן <S%H6726><s%> upon Zion קִרְיַ֖ת <S%H7151><s%> the city מֽוֹעֲדֵ֑נוּ <S%H4150><s%> of our solemnities עֵינֶיךָ֩ <S%H5869><s%> thine eyes תִרְאֶ֨ינָה <S%H7200><s%> shall see יְרוּשָׁלִַ֜ם <S%H3389><s%> Jerusalem נָוֶ֣ה <S%H5116><s%> habitation שַׁאֲנָ֗ן <S%H7600><s%> a quiet אֹ֤הֶל <S%H168><s%> a tabernacle בַּל־ <S%H1077><s%> Nor יִצְעָן֙ <S%H6813><s%> [that] shall not be taken down בַּל־ <S%H1077><s%> Nor יִסַּ֤ע <S%H5265><s%> be removed יְתֵֽדֹתָיו֙ <S%H3489><s%> not one of the stakes לָנֶ֔צַח <S%H5331><s%> thereof shall ever וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> any חֲבָלָ֖יו <S%H2256><s%> neither shall any of the cords בַּל־ <S%H1077><s%> Nor יִנָּתֵֽקוּ׃ <S%H5423><s%> thereof be broken

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> but שָׁ֞ם <S%H8033><s%> there אַדִּ֤יר <S%H117><s%> But there the glorious יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> LORD לָ֔נוּ מְקוֹם־ <S%H4725><s%> [will be] unto us a place נְהָרִ֥ים <S%H5104><s%> rivers יְאֹרִ֖ים <S%H2975><s%> [and] streams רַחֲבֵ֣י <S%H7342><s%> wide יָדָ֑יִם <S%H3027><s%> which בַּל־ <S%H1077><s%> no תֵּ֤לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> will go בּוֹ֙ אֳנִי־ <S%H590><s%> galley שַׁ֔יִט <S%H7885><s%> with oars וְצִ֥י <S%H6716><s%> ship אַדִּ֖יר <S%H117><s%> neither shall gallant לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> no יַעַבְרֶֽנּוּ׃ <S%H5674><s%> pass

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> For יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> For the LORD שֹׁפְטֵ֔נוּ <S%H8199><s%> [is] our judge יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD מְחֹקְקֵ֑נוּ <S%H2710><s%> [is] our lawgiver יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD מַלְכֵּ֖נוּ <S%H4428><s%> [is] our king ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> He יוֹשִׁיעֵֽנוּ׃ <S%H3467><s%> he will save

נִטְּשׁ֖וּ <S%H5203><s%> are loosed חֲבָלָ֑יִךְ <S%H2256><s%> Thy tacklings בַּל־ <S%H1077><s%> cannot יְחַזְּק֤וּ <S%H2388><s%> strengthen כֵן־ <S%H3651><s%> of its תָּרְנָם֙ <S%H8650><s%> their mast בַּל־ <S%H1077><s%> Nor פָּ֣רְשׂוּ <S%H6566><s%> they could not spread נֵ֔ס <S%H5251><s%> the sail אָ֣ז <S%H227><s%> Then חֻלַּ֤ק <S%H2505><s%> divided עַֽד־ <S%H5706><s%> then is the prey שָׁלָל֙ <S%H7998><s%> spoil מַרְבֶּ֔ה <S%H4766><s%> of a great פִּסְחִ֖ים <S%H6455><s%> the lame בָּ֥זְזוּ <S%H962><s%> take בַֽז׃ <S%H957><s%> the prey

וּבַל־ <S%H1077><s%> and no יֹאמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> shall not say שָׁכֵ֖ן <S%H7934><s%> And the inhabitant חָלִ֑יתִי <S%H2470><s%> I am sick הָעָ֛ם <S%H5971><s%> the people הַיֹּשֵׁ֥ב <S%H3427><s%> that dwell בָּ֖הּ נְשֻׂ֥א <S%H5375><s%> therein [shall be] forgiven עָוֹֽן׃ <S%H5771><s%> [their] iniquity
